name: Update Air Force Philosophy
description: Our air doctrines are still a relic of the time of early aviation, and what was once cutting edge now belongs in a museum. Our pilots and planning will be updated accordingly.

name: Aerial Production
description: The sudden cut of funding for the air force is perhaps a key factor why it joined us in the Revolution; now we should take the utmost care to ensure that our airplanes are both modern and well cared for. Thankfully, we have comrades from the Union of Britain who can me most helpful in this endeavour.

name: Fighter Effort
description: Aerial supremacy is key in modern war, of that few can doubt; But the advent of new mechanisms of war means that our old biplanes are not suitable for defending the skies of Chile anymore.

name: CHL_fighter2
description: Air superiority could be meaningless if we cannot capitalise in help for our troops on the frontlines; not only special aircraft is required, but specific training too.

name: CHL_fighter3
description: Our country is, from an strategic standpoint, too long in a North-South axis to be properly protected by common fighter craft. We must ensure, with the help of our comrades in Europe, that our Air Force has planes capable of long autonomous flights.

name: Aerial Strategy
description: Aerial engagements are quick and brutal affairs; and it pays to plan for them and strategic missions beforehand. What will be the focus of our air force in the war to come, our general staff must decide.

name: Aerial Tactics
description: The engagements themselves are also to be analysed, and our few planes cannot be foolishly thrown away. Careful studying and manoeuvres will be key in our coming victory.

name: Bomber Effort
description: The role of a bomber craft is somewhat new, but its uses were made apparent many times. In order to make sure we can defend the fatherland, our Weltkrieg era models will have to be replaced.

name: Modern Bomber Craft
description: Not only as to make Bombers an active, modernise part of our air force, but to also make sure they are up to date, we will continue investing on different, role based Bomber Craft!

name: Sovereign of the Pacific
description: Our fleet, with its recent additions and investments in the term of Chairman Puga, is perhaps the most powerful in South America; it is most certainly the most well armed fighting force of the South Pacific, and well capable of both defensive and offensive operations.

name: A High Seas Navy
description: The decisive battles of the wars to come will be fought on deep waters, away from coastal support. In order to make sure our navy is ready for this crucial engagement against a certain undisclosed enemy to the West, we will make drills, exercises and planning efforts.

name: Fleet Renewal
description: Our fleet, while well armed and well supplied, has many second hand or outdated vessels; If we are to modernise it, we must spare no expense in dockyards, shipyards and weapon systems.

name: Aircraft Carrier Effort
description: Many experts believe in the importance of Aircraft carriers in a naval engagement; this is especially true in our republic, given how a great many influential staff members have an air force background. While monumentally expensive, a modern aircraft carrier might mean the difference between victory and defeat.

name: Naval Strike Aircraft
description: Naval Aircraft has always been a key factor of national defence; most of our important military centres are within range of naval artillery. It's a matter of the utmost importance to ensure we can defend our coastline from foreign aggression.

name: Cruiser Breakthroughs
description: Cruisers are a mainstay of our navy, but they are all of outdated models and specifications, despite out build-up efforts. Technological improvements are in order.

name: Additional Shipyard Investments
description: A powerful navy cannot be maintained by relying on foreign shipyards. Our docks will be upgraded to modern standards, with some help from our Comrades from Europe.

name: Commission more Battleships
description: The Almirante Latorre class battleship is a fine vessel, but one that shows its age, even with the small upgrades we outfitted. We will likely require a new flagship to ensure our national security.

name: Blue Water Navy
description: Even more emphasis on Deep Water tactics, doctrines and manoeuvres will be required if our navy is to have against chance against its enemies. Practice makes perfect.

name: Submarine Ventures
description: Our current submarine fleet is small and outdated, and thus we require more recent, well armed models to keep imperialist navies at their toes.

name: Anti Submarine Effort
description: Our efforts to hunt down enemy submarines may end fruitless if our smaller ships are not modern enough, putting both our flagships and our shipping lanes at risk. We must not allow that to happen.

name: Commerce Raiders
description: Even if our navy is among the most powerful of the South, imperialist forces from Germany, the United States and Argentina could possibly make us have to rely on asymmetrical naval warfare, in order to compensate for our lack of tonnage and manpower.

name: A Nation Under Siege
description: The biggest danger to Chile is not internal, but that of the resurrecting counter-revolutionary Argentina. They do little to hide their ambitions on our territory since the birth of their nation in the 1800s, and now, emboldened by Brazilian incompetence, wish to see Chile conquered. We will not let happen!

name: Mobility Potential
description: Many have heard ideas and plans about how modern warfare will be a fast-paced, mechanised affair; even if that may not turn out to be the case, we do not have the manpower to engage in traditional war with Argentina and the other imperialists. We will do our best to improve the mobility of our forces.

name: Foreign Armour Expertise
description: Mobility has always been of great import on the battlefield. With developments in motorization and mechanization, a new generation of officers the world over have begun to promote more aggressive styles of warfare utilizing those new technologies. We should hire such men from abroad.

name: Tank Effort
description: Our military requires not only tanks, but tanks that are modern, autonomous and can deal with the harsh terrain of our homeland. Advanced war machinery may mean the difference between victory and defeat.

name: Tank Production Effort
description: We cannot mechanise our forces properly with simple imports; we must ensure our factories can supply our armed forces by themselves, for we cannot depend on other nations on such vital matters.

name: Army Rearmament
description: While the army is not underpaid or underfed as it used to be before the Revolution, it is still poorly equipped. Let us attend to the needs of our officers and ensure our Army can fight off any threats.

name: Ordinance Updates
description: Our artillery is in dire need of renewal; the battlefields of the Weltkrieg standing as witnesses. Only with newer models we can stand a chance against the Aggressor to the West.

name: Modern Military Equipment
description: Despite our efforts, the equipment in our military is not entirely up to modern standards. Our officers will require more spending and attention from our government, but the vanguard of the revolution deserves only the best!

name: Firepower Effort
description: We indeed require more accurate, well armed artillery pieces if we are to ensure the survival of our nation. Now, specialised guns, we will be able to rain fire upon the enemy!

name: High Command Reforms
description: Our military high command is in need of a shake-up, and the counter-revolutionaries will not wait for our tactics and strategies to update before attacking us!

name: Mountaineer Brigade Expansion
description: The Mountains that surround us are an integral part of any national defence plan in case of invasion. Passes, peaks and hillsides must not be garrisoned with fresh recruits, but with elite specially trained regiments who are ready for the harsh reality of mountain life.

name: Andean Strategy
description: The so-called Santiago Line will be the last stand of our nation, if Argentina overpowers us and crossed the Andes. The rough terrain near and around Santiago will be made impenetrable to foreign invaders, which will allow us to resist even the harshest numerical disadvantage.

name: Military Science
description: Our schools must, sadly enough, focus on the defence of the revolution more than in theoretical issues and questions, for the time being. All Chile will heed the call!

name: Long Term Planning
description: Not only battles and combat engagements are important, but the very movement and organisation of both our forces and that of our enemies will be thoroughly studied, and prepare our general staff for the challenge of the coming War of Imperialism.

name: Strategic Mining
description: Let us open new mines to sustain our military production, for the riches of Chile must be used to safeguard its safety.

name: Offensive Doctrine
description: We will ensure our forces and general staff are ready to go on the offensive against our enemies. Regimental pride can only go so far, strategy and planning will ensure our final victory!

name: Military Supremacy
description: Increased salaries, rations and benefits not only ensure the loyalty of the military, but make it so our forces are well equipped for the future struggles ahead.

name: Renew Strict Drill Standards
description: Chile's military was once known as the 'South Prussia', and its performance and discipline were the envy of all. Now, with its role as the vanguard of the people fulfilled, it can turn its gaze upon those would hurt our countrymen, and the ideas we stand for.

name: The Third Chairman
description: After Marmaduke Grove's defence focused term ends, who will become the Third Chairman?

name: Labarca and the Totalist Faction
description: Labarca and the Mosleyists know that only a strong government can keep Chile safe against its many enemies. The people now are safe!

name: Permanent Revolution Doctrine
description: Something that Labarcists defend, the idea that the Revolution can only be maintained by force, for reactionary elements cannot be reasoned or bargained with. The Proletarian Dictatorship will be permanent until it's not longer necessary.

name: Centralised Planning
description: All decisions about he economic and state well being must be consulted with Central Committees in Santiago. To do otherwise would be clumsy at best, treason at worst.

name: Extend Chairman's Powers
description: The Chairman still requires approval from the Syndicalist Congress for many actions, something that greatly cripples the capacity of our state to react. We must change this!

name: Revolutionary Commissars
description: Now, we can have appointed officers in army units and factories, ensuring both loyalty and hard work at all times, for an idle mind is an invitation to counter-revolution.

name: Industrial Quotas
description: Each factory, mine and commune will have goals to reach, lest all of Chile will fall. We will ensure those Quotas are met.

name: Reward Loyal Totalists
description: The men and women who helped us from the start, when our forces were weak; those will be the loyal few who will lead the vanguard party!

name: A Totalist Government
description: Totalism implies total loyalty, and total devotion to the revolutionary ideals we hold on to so dearly, no matter the cost. 'Moderates' have no place anywhere near serious decision making.

name: Ensure Officer Loyalty
description: Many officers are still traditionalist and archaic, who might as well be theocrats with their sad devotion to ancient religions. But their priests did not grant them clairvoyance to conjure up an escape from the Revolutionary Courts!

name: Dealing with Traitors
description: Some individuals still cling to counter-revolutionary ideals, and would never let them go. There is a place where they can keep said ideas: The Easter Island. Of course, bad things always happen in such long trips...

name: Direct Rule From Santiago
description: The revolution is now Total, and we can share the benefits of our long and arduous efforts. Comrade Labarca and his fellow heroes are to be praised to bring light to darkness!

name: Strengthen the Republic
description: Our revolution spent too much time worrying about threats and plots, and forgot about the common worker for whom it was supposed to fight for. This will change now!

name: Cement Authority of Congress
description: The Congress of Syndicates is still somewhat unknown by the workers; many just call it Senate out of habit. We will ensure that its members, decisions and achievements are well know by the populace.

name: Extend CSC Powers
description: The Congress of Syndicates is now a true house of democracy, unlike the parliament of the Old Republic. However, it is still quite powerless in many matters, a relic of our over-centralising presidentialist past. We must remedy this!

name: Autonomous Councils
description: The local councils of workers will now be more autonomous from Santiago, while still respecting the directives of our comrades in the capital; such balance will bring harmony to both sides of the issue.

name: Extended Local Autonomy
description: Local Communes know best what to do with their citizens, and we will allow them to choose priorities and investments accordingly.

name: Conciliation Efforts
description: Any political debate creates hostilities, and a revolution is even worse in that regard. Many qualified comrades are being discriminated against for ill informed opinions they held years ago, and that is nothing but damaging to the well being of the Republic.

name: Tackle Unemployment
description: Many in Chile's cities are not fully contributing to society, for the lack of industries is still a problem we must address as soon as possible.

name: Industrial Prosperity
description: With the reworking of the government and armed forces done, our nation can finally taste true peace and prosperity!

name: Workers of the Homefront
description: Now that so many good men are on the frontlines, our factories lack manpower to keep running. It is time we do away with conservative ideals and ensure the Women of Chile do their part.

name: Extensive Wartime Industrial Expansion
description: We will ensure that our comrades in the front are equipped and thus able to perform their duty on the field of battle.

name: Expand Arsenals
description: We must prepare with all our might for the coming storm of counter-revolution, even if that comes with violent struggle.

name: Joint Projects
description: Many of our academics will be sent to France and Europe, in order to aid both Chile and the World Revolution at large!

name: Advanced Technology Exchange
description: Our scientists partaking in studies in Europe have brought us advanced ideas and designs that may be vital for the safety tof the revolution!

name: Heavy Education Reform
description: Our Education system is flawed in many aspects, but chiefly in its gross lack of funding and state efforts to help it. That will change now.

name: Counter Revolution
description: After the fall of the Syndicalist government, we must first set up the basics of our new government.

name: Provisional Junta
description: Blanche's Junta has taken control and needs to smoothly transition to fully controlling the government of Chile.

name: Restoring Order
description: With our Junta securely in control of the former Syndicalist institutions we must first placate the population and attain a semblance of order in Chile.

name: Restoring Private Enterprises
description: To truly transition away from syndicalism we must restore private ownership, starting with important businesses.

name: Restoring Mining Industry
description: To support the rebuilding of Chile we must put competent businessmen back in charge of our country's mines.

name: Basic Economics
description: Building the base of our new economy is important to the future stability and prosperity of Chile.

name: Restoring Democratic Institutions
description: We must rebuild the former democratic institutions of the Republic of Chile.

name: Restoring Rule of Law
description: The former government has changed many of Chile's laws, we must reform them and restore the Supreme Court of Chile to achieve true rule of law.

name: The Last Power
description: To ensure a successful transition to democracy we must set up the framework for the parliament and president of the republic.

name: Emergency Aid
description: To rebuild Chile back into a stable South American democracy we must ask for aid from our former enemies around the world.

name: Reinstate Taxation
description: Taxation is a must for our country to become stable and prosperous once more, reinstating it should be a top priority.

name: De-syndicalise Provincial Organisation
description: Reorganizing the former provincial organisation will allow us to build up our industry even more.

name: Free Elections
description: With the elections finally being past us we can call ourselves a democracy once more!

name: Conservative Victory
description: With del Campo's party in power they can finally redeem themselves and bring Chile prosperity.

name: Youth Recovery
description: We must set up a program to encourage the youth of Chile to serve in the prestigious armed forces, along with benefits for families to encourage population growth to secure the future of Chile.

name: Restore the Special Status of the Church
description: One thing glossed over in our hasty reintroduction of taxation were exemptions for the church, this is something we must remedy.

name: Chilean Traditions
description: Chile must have stable and prolific education programs teaching our traditions if we are to keep up with the world scientifically.

name: Industrial Collaboration
description: By collaborating with the happy business owners we've put back in place we can easily expand our civil industry.

name: Restore Private Land Ownership
description: Giving land back to its rightful landowners will simultaneously ease the burden on our government and allow us to focus on getting more out of the land we do control.

name: Social Democrat Victory
description: With Montero wining the elections he and the party must focus on setting up the groundwork for future reforms in Chile.

name: Fuffling the Calais Pact
description: Reorganizing our party will allow us to more efficiently pass laws and influence our governmental functions.

name: Development Program
description: Working with our industrial leaders in a new government program to plan further expansion and advancement will ensure stable industrial growth.

name: The New Republic
description: Thanks to the success of our previous programs we can easily improve our party's popularity and the stability of the nation.

name: Democratic Amnesty
description: Offering amnesty to democratic exiles in South America will give us an influx of talented politicians and scientists running from oppressive regimes.

name: Rehabilitate Military
description: Much of the Military were syndicalist supporters, and though they accepted the transition of power many still hold resentment towards us, with some effort we can mend this and secure the stability of our armed forces.

name: Liberal Victory
description: With Arturo Allessandri and the Liberal Party's victory they can focus on building Chile in to an economic powerhouse once again.

name: Deregulate Prices
description: Dregulating prices will allow for organic growth of the corporate sector which we can take advantage of to speed up our own endeavours, along with letting us trade our resources more profitably.

name: Laissez-Faire
description: Our policy of laissez faire will attract more capital and skilled individuals to our country, allowing us to expand both production and research efforts.

name: Deunionise Workers
description: By getting rid of workers unions we can both deal a blow to the remaining syndicalists and expedite our expansion of industry in Chile.

name: Guarantee Press Freedom
description: By guaranteeing the freedom of the press we can send a message to all Chileans, that they are truly free and that we are unafraid to face criticism.

name: Deregulate Currencies
description: By deregulating our currency we can further rid ourselves of poor economic regulation and let the market thrive, and let us benefit.

name: Populist Victory
description: In a surprise victory Marees and his party have come out on top in the elections, and while many are not happy he is already putting plans into motion to increase his power.

name: Nationalist Junta
description: After seizing power Valderrama has already outlined a plan to viciously go after his political enemies to prevent a syndicalist counter-coup.

name: Assert Dominance
description: We must show with no uncertainty that that we control the reins of the state.

name: Cleanse Military Dissent
description: There are many in the Army that are still hold syndicalist sympathies, we must re-educate them before they become a problem.

name: Cleanse Naval Dissent
description: Even our grand navy is unsafe from syndicalist sympathizers, We must make sure they harbor these sympathizers no longer.

name: Political Peace by Force
description: Using our immense political clout and a show of force we can bring stability upon our nation.

name: Violent Desyndicalisation
description: While officially banned from participating in government any longer, there are still syndicalists among our ranks, and the remnants of their regime lay around us, we must remedy this fact swiftly.

name: Radical Curriculum Changes
description: Our education curriculum is outdated and inefficient, we must radically reform it if we wish to become a stable modern state.

name: Administrative Centralisation
description: By centralizing the administration of all sectors of the government we can secure our hold and increase military build-up simultaneously.

name: Strengthen the State
description: By taking steps to strengthen the apparatus of our state we can increase our sway and build more support.

name: Chilean Identity
description: We must promote a national identity that is distinctly Chilean to foster the pride and spirit we want for our people.

name: Nationalist Propaganda
description: Controlling media allows us to continue a flow of propaganda and build more support for our government.

name: Prussian Ethos
description: We must fully embrace our identity as 'South Prussia' and drill our military to the extremes of discipline and war readiness.

name: National Mythos
description: By promoting what it means to be Chilean and supporting Chilean culture we can foster a spirit in all of Chile that will never be broken.

name: Hispanism
description: The core idea of Hispanism is that all Spanish speaking peoples should be under one empire again, we should strive to achieve this goal!

name: Natural Order
description: It is the natural order of things for the weak to fear the strong, therefore we should foster an expanded military to support our new ideology.

name: Anti-Syndicalism
description: Though we have already taken steps to clean our country of the stain of syndicalism we should focus our efforts on quashing the final embers of the dying ideology to ensure the stability of Chile.

name: Land of Santiago
description: To achieve true Hispanism we must take the mantle as the holy leader of the Spanish speaking world and show our spirit to achieve our goals by force.
